languages.text: "Все бы ничего, да одна беда... С каждым днем жратву доставать все сложнее. Слышала, в пустоте за Фурибундусом какие-то ужасы творятся, корабли не все долетают, да и старые покровители Наместника не больно спешат ему на помощь. Все это сильно подрывает авторитет Владайма... а если его авторитет станет слишком шатким, то найдутся желающие его сменить".

traits.locale_text: "Все бы ничего, да одна беда... С каждым днем жратву доставать все сложнее. Слышала, в пустоте за Фурибундусом какие-то ужасы творятся, корабли не все долетают, да и старые покровители Наместника не больно спешат ему на помощь. Все это сильно подрывает авторитет Владайма... а если его авторитет станет слишком шатким, то найдутся желающие его сменить".

languages.text: "We make do, but the real trouble is... with every passing day it gets harder to find grub. I heard that some horrors are happening in the void outside Furibundus, that not all ships are making it here, and the Liege's old patrons don't seem to be in a hurry to help. It's taking a toll on Vladaym's authority... and if his authority wobbles too hard, he'll have plenty of people lining up to take his place."
languages.original_text: "Все бы ничего, да одна беда... С каждым днем жратву доставать все сложнее. Слышала, в пустоте за Фурибундусом какие-то ужасы творятся, корабли не все долетают, да и старые покровители Наместника не больно спешат ему на помощь. Все это сильно подрывает авторитет Владайма... а если его авторитет станет слишком шатким, то найдутся желающие его сменить".

traits.locale_text: "We make do, but the real trouble is... With every day it gets harder to find grub. I heard that some horrors are happening in the void outside Furibundus, not all ships make it here, and the Liege's old patrons don't seem to be in a hurry to help. It's taking a toll on Vladaym's authority... and if his authority wobbles too hard, he'll have plenty of takers."

"We make do, but the real trouble is... With every day it gets harder to find grub. I heard that some horrors are happening in the void outside Furibundus, not all ships make it here, and the Liege's old patrons don't seem to be in a hurry to help. It's taking a toll on Vladaym's authority... and if his authority wobbles too hard, he'll have plenty of takers."

It's taking a toll on Vladaym's authority... and if his authority wobbles too hard, he'll have plenty of people lining up to take his place."

It's taking a toll on Vladaym's authority... and if his authority wobbles too hard, he'll have plenty of people lining up to take his place."

"We make do, but the real trouble is... with every passing day it gets harder to find grub. It's taking a toll on Vladaym's authority... and if his authority wobbles too hard, he'll have plenty of people lining up to take his place."

"We make do, but the real trouble is... with every passing day it gets harder to find grub. I heard that some horrors are happening in the void outside Furibundus, that not all ships are making it here, and the Liege's old patrons don't seem to be in a hurry to help. It's taking a toll on Vladaym's authority... and if his authority wobbles too hard, he'll have plenty of people lining up to take his place."

languages.text: “我们还在勉强度日，但真正的麻烦是……越是在这里呆着，食物就越是难弄。我听说，怒焰星系之外的虚空之中发生了某些恐怖的事情，已经不是所有的船都能到这里了，而且总督的那些赞助人似乎并不怎么急着帮忙。这对弗拉迪姆的权威造成了影响……而如果他的权威动摇得太厉害，就会有很多人排着队，准备取代他的位置。”
languages.original_text: "We make do, but the real trouble is... with every passing day it gets harder to find grub. I heard that some horrors are happening in the void outside Furibundus, that not all ships are making it here, and the Liege's old patrons don't seem to be in a hurry to help. It's taking a toll on Vladaym's authority... and if his authority wobbles too hard, he'll have plenty of people lining up to take his place."

traits.locale_text: “我们还在勉强度日，但真正的麻烦是……越是在这里呆着，食物就越是难弄。我听说，怒焰星之外的虚空之中发生了某些恐怖的事情，已经不是所有的船都能到这里了，而且总督的那些赞助人似乎并不怎么急着帮忙。这对弗拉迪姆的权威造成了影响……而如果他的权威动摇得太厉害，就会有很多人排着队，准备取代他的位置。”

languages.text: «Nos las apañamos, pero el verdadero problema es que cada día que pasa es más difícil encontrar comida. Me he enterado de que en el vacío, a las afueras de Furibundus, ocurren sucesos de pesadilla. No todas las naves logran llegar aquí y, encima, los patrones del viejo señor no parecen tener mucha prisa por ayudar. El problema está hundiendo la autoridad de Vladaym... y si su autoridad se tambalea, habrá una cola de gente dispuesta a ocupar su puesto».
languages.original_text: "We make do, but the real trouble is... with every passing day it gets harder to find grub. I heard that some horrors are happening in the void outside Furibundus, that not all ships are making it here, and the Liege's old patrons don't seem to be in a hurry to help. It's taking a toll on Vladaym's authority... and if his authority wobbles too hard, he'll have plenty of people lining up to take his place."

traits.locale_text: «Nos las apañamos, pero el verdadero problema es que cada día que pasa es más difícil encontrar comida. Me he enterado de que en el vacío, a las afueras de Furibundus, ocurren sucesos de pesadilla. No todas las naves logran llegar aquí y, encima, los patrones del viejo señor no parecen tener mucha prisa por ayudar. El problema está hundiendo la autoridad de Vladaym... y si su autoridad se tambalea, habrá una cola de gente dispuesta a ocupar su puesto».

languages.text: 「なんとかやってるけど…一番の問題は日を追うごとに食料を確保するのが難しくなってることだね。フリブンダス外のヴォイドでとんでもないことが起きてるせいでここに来れない船もあるって聞いたし、領主のパトロンが急いで助けようとしている様子もない。そのせいでヴラダイムは権威を失いつつある…彼の権威が揺らいだら、彼の座を狙う奴が大勢現れるだろうね」
languages.original_text: "We make do, but the real trouble is... with every passing day it gets harder to find grub. I heard that some horrors are happening in the void outside Furibundus, that not all ships are making it here, and the Liege's old patrons don't seem to be in a hurry to help. It's taking a toll on Vladaym's authority... and if his authority wobbles too hard, he'll have plenty of people lining up to take his place."

traits.locale_text: 「なんとかやってるけど…一番の問題は日を追うごとに食料を確保するのが難しくなってることだね。フリブンダス外のヴォイドでとんでもないことが起きてるせいでここに来れない船もあるって聞いたし、領主のパトロンが急いで助けようとしている様子もない。そのせいでヴラダイムは権威を失いつつある…彼の権威が揺らいだら、彼の座を狙う奴が大勢現れるだろうね」

languages.text: "Wir kommen über die Runden, aber das eigentliche Problem ist ... es wird jeden Tag schwieriger, etwas zu essen zu finden. Angeblich ereignen sich in der Leere außerhalb von Furibundus schreckliche Dinge, nicht alle Schiffe schaffen es bis hierher, und die alten Partner des Lehnsherrn scheinen es nicht eilig zu haben, ihm zu helfen. Vladayms Autorität hat darunter gelitten ... und viel sollte nicht mehr passieren, denn seine potenziellen Nachfolger stehen jetzt schon Schlange."
languages.original_text: "We make do, but the real trouble is... with every passing day it gets harder to find grub. I heard that some horrors are happening in the void outside Furibundus, that not all ships are making it here, and the Liege's old patrons don't seem to be in a hurry to help. It's taking a toll on Vladaym's authority... and if his authority wobbles too hard, he'll have plenty of people lining up to take his place."

traits.locale_text: "Wir kommen über die Runden, aber das eigentliche Problem ist ... es wird jeden Tag schwieriger, etwas zu essen zu finden. Angeblich ereignen sich in der Leere außerhalb von Furibundus schreckliche Dinge, nicht alle Schiffe schaffen es bis hierher, und die alten Partner des Lehnsherrn scheinen es nicht eilig zu haben, ihm zu helfen. Vladayms Autorität hat darunter gelitten ... und viel sollte nicht mehr passieren, denn seine potenziellen Nachfolger stehen jetzt schon Schlange."

languages.text: « On fait aller, mais le vrai problème, c'est que... avec chaque jour qui passe, on a de plus en plus de mal à se remplir la panse. Il se passe apparemment pas mal d'horreurs dans l'espace hors de Furibundus. Tous les vaisseaux n'arrivent pas jusqu'ici, et les anciens mécènes du suzerain n'ont pas l'air décidés à bouger le petit doigt. Ça met un sacré coup à l'autorité de Vladaym... et si ça continue comme ça, y a un paquet de gens qui vont finir par se battre pour prendre sa place. »
languages.original_text: "We make do, but the real trouble is... with every passing day it gets harder to find grub. I heard that some horrors are happening in the void outside Furibundus, that not all ships are making it here, and the Liege's old patrons don't seem to be in a hurry to help. It's taking a toll on Vladaym's authority... and if his authority wobbles too hard, he'll have plenty of people lining up to take his place."

traits.locale_text: « On fait aller, mais le vrai problème, c'est que... avec chaque jour qui passe, on a de plus en plus de mal à se remplir la panse. Il se passe apparemment pas mal d'horreurs dans l'espace hors de Furibundus. Tous les vaisseaux n'arrivent pas jusqu'ici, et les anciens mécènes du suzerain n'ont pas l'air décidés à bouger le petit doigt. Ça met un sacré coup à l'autorité de Vladaym... et si ça continue comme ça, y a un paquet de gens qui vont finir par se battre pour prendre sa place. »

languages.text: "İdare ediyoruz işte ama asıl dert başka. Her geçen gün yiyecek lokma bulmak zorlaşıyor. Furibundus'un ötesindeki uçsuzda korkunç şeyler olduğunu ve bazı gemilerin buraya ulaşamadığını duydum. Emîr'in eski destekçileri de yardım etmeye hiç can atıyor gibi değil. Bu da Vladaym'ın otoritesini sarsıyor. Kökünden çatırmaya başlarsa yerine geçmek isteyen sıra olmuş bir dolu insan var."
languages.original_text: "We make do, but the real trouble is... with every passing day it gets harder to find grub. I heard that some horrors are happening in the void outside Furibundus, that not all ships are making it here, and the Liege's old patrons don't seem to be in a hurry to help. It's taking a toll on Vladaym's authority... and if his authority wobbles too hard, he'll have plenty of people lining up to take his place."

traits.locale_text: "İdare ediyoruz işte ama asıl dert başka... Gün geçtikçe yiyecek iki lokma bulmakta zorlanıyoruz. Furibundus'un dışındaki uçsuzda korkunç şeyler olduğunu ve bazı gemilerin buraya ulaşamadığını duydum; Emîr'in eski destekçileri de hiç yardım etmeye can atıyor gibi değil. Vladaym'ın otoritesi sarsılıyor... Eğer otoritesi fazla sarsılırsa, yerine geçmek için sıra olmuş çok insan var."
